## hpr1632 :: 5150 Shades of Beer: 0002 Wichita Brewing Company

 
https://www.freddysusa.com/ Now I'll hear from Freddy's lawyers
https://wichitabrew.com Tyler and 13th - Go There!
https://www.ripsneakers.com/nodding/ The brew pub tlkg took us too
https://www.readingterminalmarket.org/ Not mentioned in this prodcast, but if you ever find yourself in Philly, for the love of all that you find holy, spend a good part of your time here. You will thank me.
